myfoodora

Class Meal

  • java.lang.Object
    • myfoodora.Meal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FullMeal, HalfMeal

    public abstract class Meal
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Meals are sets of dishes, and benefit of a discount (default value : 5%) They can be meals of the week, thus benefit of a greater discount (default : 10%) For now, they come in two kinds : full meals (3 items), or half-meals (2 items). We use a factory pattern so this can be easily extended in the future.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
